meanings.definition: A medical instrument used for listening to sounds produced within the body, especially the heart and lungs.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used a stethoscope to listen to my heartbeat.
meanings.sent2: Every nurse carries a stethoscope around their neck in the hospital.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat mistook the stethoscope for a toy and batted at it playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her stethoscope was like a magic wand, revealing the secrets of the body's inner workings.
meanings.sent5: The shiny stethoscope gleamed under the bright hospital lights, ready to diagnose any ailment.
